hunger.title: Glutton
hunger.description: as a §aGourmand§f, your §4§lstomach §fdemands to §4§lconstantly be fed

entity_data.CommandOnEntityHit: execute at @s as @e[distance=0..3,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] unless entity @s[palladium.power=alienevo_aliens:lepidopterran] at @s run effect give @s alienevo:goo 15 0 true

digestion.title: digest
first_tick_commands: execute as @s if entity @e[type=!minecraft:ender_dragon,type=!minecraft:warden,type=!minecraft:wither,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s upchuck:gourmand stomach 150
execute as @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:ender_dragon,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s upchuck:gourmand stomach 1000
execute as @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:warden,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s upchuck:gourmand stomach 850
execute as @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:wither,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s upchuck:gourmand stomach 900
execute as @s if entity @e[type=#upchuck:float,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run effect give @s minecraft:levitation 10 1 true
execute as @s if entity @e[type=#upchuck:float,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run playsound upchuck:gangsta master @s ~ ~ ~ 2
execute as @s if entity @e[sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run scoreboard players set @s Gourmand.Swallow 1

blast_unlock.title: Energy Blast
blast_unlock.description: Use the energy you obtain from eating organic materials to shoot out an energy blast

chomp_unlock.title: Chomp
chomp_unlock.description: Chomp on organic materials and projectiles to obtain energy

swallow_unlock.title: Swallow
swallow_unlock.description: Pull mobs inside you via your extendable tongue and be able to spit them out any time
